titles.title: Fairness in Nursing Home Arbitration Act
Fairness in Nursing Home Arbitration Act
A bill to amend chapter 1 of title 9 of United States Code with respect to arbitration.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2819-2820)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committees on Aging. Joint hearings held with Committee on the Judiciary, Subcommittee on Antitrust, Competition Policy and Consumer Rights.

calendar.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Leahy without amendment. With written report No. 110-518. Minority views filed.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1109.

bill.summary: 10/1/2008--Reported to Senate without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Fairness in Nursing Home Arbitration Act - Provides that a pre-dispute arbitration agreement between a long-term care facility and a resident (or anyone acting on the resident's behalf) shall not be valid or specifically enforceable.
